addition.code: test_input_fields method implementing comprehensive input field testing workflow

key_features: JSON-RPC structured requests to Flutter automation tools
Clear/readable test flow with numbered steps
Flexible text field validation (checks both 'text' and 'controllerText' properties)

patterns_discovered: Consistent JSON-RPC request/response pattern for Flutter tool interactions
Structured logging with visual indicators (✅/❌/⚠️) for test status
Comprehensive property-based verification rather than simple assertion
Graceful degradation when operations partially succeed
Clear separation of test steps with logical flow: Type → Verify → Clear → Verify Empty
gotchas_discovered: TextField text might be stored in either 'text' or 'controllerText' property
Clear operations may not always return clear success indicators
Partial success in one step should not necessarily fail the entire test
Empty field verification should handle both null and empty string cases

approach_outcome.robustness: Comprehensive error handling and flexible verification
approach_outcome.maintainability: Well-structured with clear logging and separation of concerns

recommendations: Consider adding configuration options for strict vs flexible text matching
Extract common JSON-RPC request patterns into helper methods
Add timeout/retry logic for property verification steps
Consider creating a base test class with common setup/teardown patterns
